title: How do music artists get a lot of girls in their music videos? Do they pay them? And how do they contact them? - Quora

response.answer_text: Casting is a good possibility. Usually they are actresses or dancers or whatever. It means, they are professionals or at least semi professionals (therefore they don’t look ridiculous). And I assume they get paid, however the single agreements might change on a case by case basis. One point is: if they were amateurs and don’t get paid, a mistake or a distraction (say, one is putting the finger in the nose) can cost minutes of filming. And usually you can’t afford loosing too much time when you have tons of persons and rented a space, etc. It is better, more efficient and “cheaper” to work with professionals. And that means: fees. If your question behind the question is that you want to apply, better ask another question from zero. There are several people that could help with that as well. Juan Maria Solare

Girls in music videos are models. They are usually hired through a modeling agency and payment is worked out by the video producer and the agency. All you have to do is find the numbers for modeling agencies and call them.
